pageContext.claim: “You forced our Nation through turmoil and torment over a wholly fabricated story, illegally purchased from a foreign spy by Hillary Clinton and the DNC in order to assault our democracy. Yet, when the monstrous lie was debunked and this Democrat conspiracy dissolved into dust, you did not apologize.”
pageContext.analysis: The FBI’s counterintelligence operation into whether Russia was assisting the Trump campaign was not prompted by the dossier. It was opened as a result of intelligence from Australia that a Trump campaign staffer had been bragging about working with Russia. The FBI was, however, aware of the document and used Steele as a source.
